samples.title: Managed Storage Account
samples.description: This sample deploys a managed storage account. It also deploys a virtual network, public IP address and a network security group.

samples.title: Managed Virtual Machine
samples.description: This sample deploys a managed virtual machine. It also deploys a virtual network, public IP address and a network security group.

samples.title: Managed AKS
samples.description: This sample deploys a managed AKS cluster. It also deploys a virtual network, public IP address and a network security group.
